long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Master Your Digital Life with Screeni
Stop wondering where your time goes online. Screeni transforms your browsing habits into actionable insights with a beautiful, distraction-free interface that works for you—filling the gap left by outdated, unintuitive tools.

Transform Your Online Time
Boost Productivity: Watch your efficiency soar with real-time session tracking and stunning visual breakdowns.
Understand Your Patterns: Gain clarity with intelligent daily and weekly analytics.
Eliminate Distractions: Take control instantly by blocking distracting sites with a single click.
Enjoy Seamless Design: Screeni adapts to your environment with automatic dark/light theme switching.
Built for Real People
Whether you're a student powering through finals, a professional maximizing productivity, or someone who wants to browse more mindfully, Screeni adapts to your needs without getting in your way.

Why Screeni Stands Out
Runs silently in the background while you work.
Provides insights through an elegant, intuitive dashboard.
Keeps your data 100% private and secure in your browser.
Completely free and open-source.
Ready to take back control of your screen time? Get started with Screeni in seconds—no account required.
